languages.text: "Темные умело плетут сети из манипуляций и лжи. Не кори себя слишком сильно — даже лучшим из детей Азуриана не всегда удается из них выбраться. Ну а ты, элантах, противостоял{mf||а} кузенам достойнее многих".

"The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."
languages.original_text: "Темные умело плетут сети из манипуляций и лжи. Не кори себя слишком сильно — даже лучшим из детей Азуриана не всегда удается из них выбраться. Ну а ты, элантах, противостоял{mf||а} кузенам достойнее многих".

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulations. Don't be too hard on yourself — even the most esteemed children of Asuryan cannot always escape them. And you, elantach, had put up a quite admirable fight against my cousins."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulations. Don't be too hard on yourself — even the most esteemed children of Asuryan cannot always escape them. And you, elantach, had put up a quite admirable fight against my cousins."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “黑暗灵族非常擅长编织欺骗与操纵的罗网。不要过分苛责自己，就连最高贵的阿苏焉之子有时也会落入他们的陷阱。不过，外界人，你挡住了他们的进攻，这已经比很多人做得要好了。”
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: “黑暗灵族非常擅长编织欺骗与操纵的罗网。不要过分苛责自己，就连最高贵的阿苏焉之子有时也会落入他们的陷阱。不过，外界人，你挡住了他们的进攻，这已经比很多人做得要好了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Los Drukhari tejen con maestría sus redes de engaño y manipulación. No te castigues muy severamente; ni siquiera el más estimado hijo de Asuryan logra escapar siempre de sus garras. Pero tú, elantach, te opusiste a mis parientes con más destreza que muchos».
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: «Los Drukhari tejen con maestría sus redes de engaño y manipulación. No te castigues muy severamente; ni siquiera el más estimado hijo de Asuryan logra escapar siempre de sus garras. Pero tú, elantach, te opusiste a mis parientes con más destreza que muchos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Les Drukharis sont passés maîtres dans l'art de tisser des toiles de mensonges et de manipulations. Ne soyez pas si sévère avec vous-même : même les plus respectables des enfants d'Asuryan ne parviennent pas toujours à leur échapper. Mais vous, elantach, avez réussi à leur résister bien mieux que beaucoup d'entre nous. »
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: « Les Drukharis sont passés maîtres dans l'art de tisser des toiles de mensonges et de manipulations. Ne soyez pas si sévère avec vous-même : même les plus respectables des enfants d'Asuryan ne parviennent pas toujours à leur échapper. Mais vous, elantach, avez réussi à leur résister bien mieux que beaucoup d'entre nous. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Die Drukhari spinnen ihr Netz aus Täuschung und Manipulation meisterhaft. Seid nicht zu hart zu Euch selbst – sogar die geschätztesten Kinder von Asuryan entgehen ihren Fängen nicht immer. Ihr jedoch, Elantach, habt meinen Verwandten fähiger widerstanden als viele andere."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: "Die Drukhari spinnen ihr Netz aus Täuschung und Manipulation meisterhaft. Seid nicht zu hart zu Euch selbst – sogar die geschätztesten Kinder von Asuryan entgehen ihren Fängen nicht immer. Ihr jedoch, Elantach, habt meinen Verwandten fähiger widerstanden als viele andere."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「デュカーリは巧みに欺瞞と策略の網を紡ぐ。自分をそう厳しく責めるな。最も尊敬されるアシュリアンの御子でさえ、彼らの魔の手から逃れることはできない。だが、エランタ、お前は我の従兄弟たちに対して、多くの者よりも巧みに抵抗した」
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: 「デュカーリは巧みに欺瞞と策略の網を紡ぐ。自分をそう厳しく責めるな。最も尊敬されるアシュリアンの御子でさえ、彼らの魔の手から逃れることはできない。だが、エランタ、お前は我の従兄弟たちに対して、多くの者よりも巧みに抵抗した」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Drukhariler, kandırmaca ve manipülasyon ağlarını ustaca örer. Kendine bu kadar yüklenme. En saygın Asuryan'ın Çocukları bile her daim onlardan kurtulamayabilir. Fakat sen elantach, soydaşlarıma birçoklarından daha büyük bir ustalıkla direndin."
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari masterfully spin their webs of deceit and manipulation. Do not castigate yourself too harshly — even the most esteemed Children of Asuryan cannot always escape their clutches. But you, elantach, resisted my cousins more ably than many."

traits.locale_text: "Drukhari, kandırmaca ve manipülasyon ağlarını ustaca ördü. Kendine bu kadar yüklenme. En saygın Asuryan'ın Çocukları bile her zaman onlardan kurtulamıyor. Fakat sen elantach, kuzenlerime birçoklarından daha büyük bir ustalıkla direndin."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
